MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Boredom Proneness Scale

Reference:
Farmer, R., Sundberg, N.D. (1986). Boredom Proneness--The Development and Correlates of a New Scale. Journal of Personality Assessment, 50(1): 4-17. doi: 10.1207/s15327752jpa5001_2

BPS_sum.Description: Assessing 'the tendency towards experiencing boredom' (Farmer and Sundberg, 1986, page 14)
